lines.text: They's some things I don't got to be told. I can see 'em in folks' eyes.

[With bravado]
It takes a silver bullet to kill Brutus Jones.
Ain't talking big what makes a man big, s'long as he makes folks believe it?

[Jones prepares to escape into the jungle]
Give my regards to any ghosts yer 'appen to meet!

[pause]
If dat ghost have money, I tells him never to haunt you lessen he wants to lose it!
